data.title: Is Arizona Christian University a Division I school?
data.meta_description: No, Arizona Christian University is not a Division I school. They are part of the National Association of Intercollegiate Athletics (NAIA), an organization that governs smaller collegiate athletics programs. Arizona Christian University primarily competes in the Golden State Athletic Conference within the NAIA, which allows them to compete at a high level, though not under the NCAA Division I umbrella.
data.text:
Hi there! I'm looking into Arizona Christian University and trying to find out what division their sports program is inâ€”are they in Division I? If you have any info, please share! Thanks!

4 months ago

No, Arizona Christian University is not a Division I school. They are part of the National Association of Intercollegiate Athletics (NAIA), an organization that governs smaller collegiate athletics programs. Arizona Christian University primarily competes in the Golden State Athletic Conference within the NAIA, which allows them to compete at a high level, though not under the NCAA Division I umbrella.

4 months ago
